message: I'd like to take the risk and buy the product as the first buyer. Since there are no prior sales data, I have no information to bias my decision, so I'll just make an uninformed decision based on the expected value of the product. With a 50% chance of being high-quality and a 50% chance of being low-quality, my expected value is ($12000 * 0.5) + ($0 * 0.5) = $6000. Since I'm willing to pay $10000, I'll take the chance and buy the product.
